name: Horizontes Escuela de Aviación TGU (Tegucigalpa)
about: Horizontes Escuela de Aviación, located in Tegucigalpa, Honduras, is the most prestigious aviation training center in Central America. We offer a wide range of programs, including Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Night Rating, and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL). Our institution is renowned for its high standards and comprehensive training, ensuring students are well-prepared for careers in aviation. With a strong commitment to excellence, Horizontes Escuela de Aviación has consistently ranked among the top 20 flight schools in Latin America. We provide both daytime and nighttime training sessions to accommodate various schedules. Our dedication to quality education and safety makes us a leader in aviation training in the region.
